Description:
Detects a Windows Filtering Platform (WFP) blocked connection event involving common Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) agents.
Adversaries may use WFP filters to prevent Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) agents from reporting security events.


Author: @gott_cyber
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Windows Filtering Platform Blocked Connection From EDR Agent Binary
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '5157' and (application like '%\amsvc.exe' or application like '%\cb.exe' or application like '%\cetasvc.exe' or application like '%\cntaosmgr.exe' or application like '%\cramtray.exe' or application like '%\crssvc.exe' or application like '%\csfalconcontainer.exe' or application like '%\csfalconservice.exe' or application like '%\cybereasonav.exe' or application like '%\cylancesvc.exe' or application like '%\cyserver.exe' or application like '%\cyveraservice.exe' or application like '%\cyvrfsflt.exe' or application like '%\eiconnector.exe' or application like '%\elastic-agent.exe' or application like '%\elastic-endpoint.exe' or application like '%\endpointbasecamp.exe' or application like '%\executionpreventionsvc.exe' or application like '%\filebeat.exe' or application like '%\fortiedr.exe' or application like '%\hmpalert.exe' or application like '%\hurukai.exe' or application like '%\logprocessorservice.exe' or application like '%\mcsagent.exe' or application like '%\mcsclient.exe' or application like '%\msmpeng.exe' or application like '%\mssense.exe' or application like '%\ntrtscan.exe' or application like '%\pccntmon.exe' or application like '%\qualysagent.exe' or application like '%\repmgr.exe' or application like '%\reputils.exe' or application like '%\repux.exe' or application like '%\repwav.exe' or application like '%\repwsc.exe' or application like '%\sedservice.exe' or application like '%\sensecncproxy.exe' or application like '%\senseir.exe' or application like '%\sensendr.exe' or application like '%\sensesampleuploader.exe' or application like '%\sentinelagent.exe' or application like '%\sentinelagentworker.exe' or application like '%\sentinelbrowsernativehost.exe' or application like '%\sentinelhelperservice.exe' or application like '%\sentinelservicehost.exe' or application like '%\sentinelstaticengine.exe' or application like '%\sentinelstaticenginescanner.exe' or application like '%\sfc.exe' or application like '%\sophos ui.exe' or application like '%\sophosfilescanner.exe' or application like '%\sophosfs.exe' or application like '%\sophoshealth.exe' or application like '%\sophosips.exe' or application like '%\sophoslivequeryservice.exe' or application like '%\sophosnetfilter.exe' or application like '%\sophosntpservice.exe' or application like '%\sophososquery.exe' or application like '%\sspservice.exe' or application like '%\taniumclient.exe' or application like '%\taniumcx.exe' or application like '%\taniumdetectengine.exe' or application like '%\tmbmsrv.exe' or application like '%\tmccsf.exe' or application like '%\tmlisten.exe' or application like '%\tmwscsvc.exe' or application like '%\traps.exe' or application like '%\winlogbeat.exe' or application like '%\wscommunicator.exe' or application like '%\xagt.exe')
